LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing Query: Your Ultimate Data Exploration Tool
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Unlock the Power of Your Data with Query
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Seamlessly navigate through complex datasets, ask questions in natural language, and gain valuable insights with our intuitive Query app.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Powerful Query Builder for Effortless Data Analysis
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Craft complex queries with ease using our intuitive drag-and-drop interface.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: See your query results instantly as you build, allowing for quick iterations and refinements.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Create and run queries seamlessly across multiple databases and data sources.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Craft complex queries with ease using our drag-and-drop interface, designed for both beginners and experts.
FEATURE_2_BODY: See your query results instantly as you build, allowing for quick iterations and refinements.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Connect and query multiple databases seamlessly, including SQL, NoSQL, and cloud-based solutions.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Refine your data with powerful filtering tools, ensuring you get exactly the information you need.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Share queries, results, and insights with team members in real-time, fostering better collaboration.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Receive intelligent recommendations to improve query performance and efficiency automatically.
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Have questions or need assistance? We're here to help you make the most of your querying experience.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about Query
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Query is an innovative app designed to simplify and streamline the process of creating, managing, and executing database queries.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Query provides an intuitive interface where users can easily construct database queries using visual tools or write them manually. It then processes and executes these queries, delivering results quickly and efficiently.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Who can benefit from using Query?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Query is ideal for database administrators, developers, data analysts, and anyone who needs to work with databases regularly. It's suitable for both beginners and experienced professionals.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is Query compatible with different database systems?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, Query is designed to work with a wide range of popular database management systems, including MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, and Microsoft SQL Server.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I save and share my queries with team members?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! Query allows you to save your queries, organize them into projects, and easily share them with team members for collaborative work and knowledge sharing.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is QueryCraft and how does it work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: QueryCraft is an intuitive app designed to simplify the process of creating and managing database queries. It provides a user-friendly interface for constructing complex queries without extensive SQL knowledge.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Who can benefit from using QueryCraft?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: QueryCraft is ideal for data analysts, business intelligence professionals, and anyone who needs to extract insights from databases but may not have advanced SQL skills. It's also useful for experienced developers looking to streamline their query-building process.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Does QueryCraft support multiple database types?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, QueryCraft supports a wide range of popular database systems, including MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, and Microsoft SQL Server. This versatility allows you to work with various data sources seamlessly.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I save and share my queries with team members?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! QueryCraft offers robust collaboration features, allowing you to save, organize, and share your queries with team members. This promotes knowledge sharing and enhances productivity across your organization.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © 2023 QueryCraft. Empowering your data exploration journey.

TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've never seen a query tool this user-friendly. It's perfect for both beginners and experts alike.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Query has become an indispensable part of our workflow. It's boosted our team's productivity tenfold.
